Name: Bridge Capital Holdings
Description: DELISTED - Bridge Capital Holdings is a bank holding company. The Company is a holding company for its subsidiary, Bridge Bank, National Association (the Bank). The bank's corporate banking services include cash and treasury management solutions, automated clearing house (ACH) payment and wire solutions, fraud protection and online banking. In addition, the Bank's International Banking Division serves clients operating in the global marketplace through services including foreign exchange (payments and hedging), letters of credit, and import/export financing. In August 2012, the Company announced the creation of its Capital Finance Division, previously known as the Bridge Capital Finance Group (BCFG).
